div.p: We think that daily job activities can be more intuitive, efficient, automated, .. and even fun.

tr.td:
Full featured
Today's enterprise challenges are multiple. We provide one module for each need.

Open Source
To Build a great product, we rely on the knowledge of thousands of contributors.

User Friendly
In order to be productive, people need clean and easy to use interface.

a.t-att-class: classname + (menu.children.length ? ' submenu' : ' leaf') + (menu_first and level == 1 ? ' opened' : '')

input.name: ufile
input.title: Add attachment
input.t-att-onclick: view.datarecord.id ? null : 'alert(\'No record selected ! You can only attach to existing record.\'); return false;'

button.title: Send an e-mail with your default e-mail client

div.p: (Any existing filter with the same name will be replaced)

tr.td: This wizard will export all data that matches the current search criteria to a CSV file. You can export all data or only the fields that can be reimported after modification.

tr.th: Fields to export Save fields list

form.name: import_data
form.p: Select a .CSV file to import. If you need a sample of file to import, you should use the export tool with the "Import Compatible" option.

label.title: For use if CSV files have titles on multiple lines, skips more than a single line during import

t.p: Here is a preview of the file we could not import:

div.p:
Copyright © 2011-TODAY OpenERP SA. All Rights Reserved.
OpenERP is a trademark of the OpenERP SA Company.
Licenced under the terms of GNU Affero General Public License

OpenERP is a free enterprise-scale software system that is designed to boost productivity and profit through data integration. It connects, improves and manages business processes in areas such as sales, finance, supply chain, project management, production, services, CRM, etc...

The system is platform-independent, and can be installed on Windows, Mac OS X, and various Linux and other Unix-based distributions. Its architecture enables new functionality to be rapidly created, modifications to be made to a production system and migration to a new version to be straightforward.
Depending on your needs, OpenERP is available through a web or application client.
